39 enum class OPERATIONS
40 {
41  // for contours detection
42  USE_CANNY = 1,
43  USE_VARIANCES = 2,
44 
45  // Additional operation
46  USE_CANNY_ON_VARIANCES = 32,
47  USE_OTHER_COLOR_SPACE = 64,
48  USE_CLAHE = 128,
49  USE_BILATERAL = 256,
50  USE_MORPHOLOGY = 512
51 };

prl::FBCITB_ParamsCodes::BILATERAL_FILTER_KERNEL_INTENSITY_SIGMA
Bilateral filter intensity sigma.
prl::FBCITB_ParamsCodes::CANNY_GAUSSIAN_BLUR_KERNEL_SIZE
Gaussian blur kernel size for Canny edge detector.
prl::FBCITB_ParamsCodes::COLOR_SPACE
Color space parameter.
prl::FBCITB_ParamsCodes::BILATERAL_FILTER_KERNEL_SPATIAL_SIGMA
Bilateral filter spatial sigma.
prl::OPERATIONS::USE_OTHER_COLOR_SPACE
Change processed image color space.
prl::OPERATIONS::USE_CANNY
Use Canny edge detector.
prl::OPERATIONS::USE_CANNY_ON_VARIANCES
Apply Canny edge detector to local variance values map.
prl::FBCITB_ParamsCodes::CANNY_UPPER_THRESHOLD_COEFF
Coefficient for upper threshold of Canny edge detector.
prl::OPERATIONS::USE_BILATERAL
Use bilateral filtration.
prl::FBCITB_ParamsCodes::BILATERAL_FILTER_KERNEL_SIZE
Bilateral filter kernel size.
